turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Jeff, can you order a coffee from Peet's for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 853 Broadway in Manhattan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, a large Caffe Mocha with whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to add anything in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks. Could you make that with sugar-free chocolate syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else from Peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What name did you want to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lisa Valdez, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, it will be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. I'm on my way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Anything else I can do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll do, Jeff. Thanks. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye, Lisa.
